name: Cookie Blast - Puzzle Legend
description:
Are you looking for a fun match 3 game? You do not have to spend time because Cookie Blast - Puzzle Legend is what you want!
Cookie Blast - Puzzle Legend is full of fun and challenges!
With Cookie Blast - Puzzle Legend, get to reach some insane high scores and compare them with other people.

Cookie Blast - Puzzle Legend features:
* Easy to play, Just swap cookie & math cookie.
* More than 40 kinds of delicious cookie.
* Train your brain and fingers
* Completely free!
* Good art screen,soothing good music.
* You can play offline!

HOW TO PLAY
• Swipe to match 3 or more cookie.
• Match 4 or more luscious cookies to create powerful special cookie
• Collect the cookie, and complete the levels!


Cookie Blast - Puzzle Legend is suitable for all people and all language.
What are you waiting for? Download it now and enjoy the addictive match 3 gaming.
